Chapter Previous Next

class gstPHANToMTranslation : public gstPHANToMDynamic

Translation-only PHANToM dynamic class. This sets the PHANToM to control the geometry of its subgraph through translation only. Dynamic forces are sent back to PHANToM to add force feedback information to translation. Note that mass and damping can be modified through methods inherited from gstDynamic.

From header file: gstPHANToMTranslation.h
